metadata.title: CVE-2024-36970 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:iwlwifi: Use request_module_nowait This appears to work around a deadlockregression that came in with the LED merge in 6.9. The deadlock happens onmy system with 24 iwlwifi radios, so maybe it something like all workerthreads are busy and some work that needs to complete cannot complete.[also remove unnecessary "load_module" var and now-wrong comment]

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
